title: Black Screen of Death

body:
I have removed all 3rd party software, I have also run the lol repair. i dont have lol replay. ive done troubleshooting but nothing has changed. furthermore i have completely uninstalled and re-installed LOL and ive also manually removed the lol_launcher and the lol _client to try fix it, and lastly i lowered the game quality but nothing so far has worked.
